mapper.insert: INSERT INTO students (fullname, hurigana, nickname, email, address, age, gender, remark, is_deleted) VALUES (#{fullname}, #{hurigana}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{address}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{remark}, false)
INSERT INTO students_courses (course_id, student_id, course_name, start_date, expected_date) VALUES (#{courseId}, #{studentId}, #{courseName}, #{startDate}, #{expectedDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE students SET fullname = #{fullname}, hurigana = #{hurigana}, nickname = #{nickname}, email = #{email}, address = #{address}, age = #{age}, gender = #{gender}, remark = #{remark}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted} WHERE student_id = #{studentId}
